Question
========

Suppose the height of Dutch men has a normal distribution with a mean of 175 centimeters and a standard deviation of 7.5 centimeters. The percentage between 170 cm and 182.5 cm can be written as:

Answerlist
----------

* P(0,67)
* P(-0.67 > z > 1)
* P(-0.67 < z < 1)

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* P(0.67) Incorrect
* P(-0.67 > z > 1) Incorrect
* P(-0.67 < z < 1) Correct
